title: Right to vote, women in industrialized countries

content.question: Which of the following factors contributed most to women gaining the right to vote in industrialized countries between 1914 and 1950 ?

choices.label: In the First and Second World Wars, women made highly visible contributions to the war effort.
Women’s life expectancies increased at a faster rate than did the life expectancies of men.
New psychological research discredited earlier theories of a link between gender and intelligence.

content.answer: In the First and Second World Wars, women made highly visible contributions to the war effort.

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
